scriptName: Scripting/True.
scriptTrans: 真实 真

scriptName: Audio/Music/Playing Music is from Script
scriptArg: The music scripting system is on.
scriptTrans: 演奏音乐来自脚本

scriptName: Audio/Sound has completed playing.
scriptTrans: 声音已经播放完毕

scriptName: Camera/Camera entered trigger area.
scriptTrans: 摄像机进入触发区

scriptName: Camera/Camera following spline path hits specified waypoint.
scriptTrans: 跟随样条路径的摄像机到达指定的路径点

scriptName: Camera/Camera movement finished.
scriptTrans: 摄像机运动完成

scriptName: Campaign/Test a campaign flag.
scriptArg: Test the value of campaign flag ~.
scriptTrans: 测试一面竞选旗帜

scriptName: Game Type/Compares the number of players in game to a value.
scriptTrans: 将游戏中的玩家数量与一个值进行比较

scriptName: Interface/Mission Hot-Spot/Mission hot-spot has been activated.
scriptTrans: 任务热点已经激活

scriptName: Movie/Movie in the radar has completed playing.
scriptTrans: 电影在雷达上已经完成播放

scriptName: Object Type/Area or Path/Named object can path to named object.
scriptTrans: 命名对象可以路径到命名对象

scriptName: Object Type/Area or Path/Named object can path to waypoint.
scriptTrans: 命名对象可以路径到路径点

scriptName: Object Type/Area or Path/Named object exits an area.
scriptTrans: 命名对象退出一个区域

scriptName: Object Type/Area or Path/Named object has reached the end of a specific waypoint path. (Unreliable)
scriptTrans: 命名对象已到达特定路径点路径的终点。 (不可靠)

scriptTrans: 命名对象在一个区域内

scriptName: Object Type/Area or Path/Named object is outside an area.
scriptTrans: 命名对象在区域之外

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Evaluate if a named object is being attacked but cannot retaliate
scriptArg: Evaluate if ~ is being attacked and cannot retaliate.
scriptTrans: 评估指定对象是否正在受到攻击但无法进行报复

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object exists and is alive.
scriptDesc: This checks to see if the object exists on the level, and is not effectively dead.  This means it will fire if the unit is around and not dead, a unit in its slow death will cause this to return false.
scriptTrans: 命名对象存在并且是活动的

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object has been attacked by Player.
scriptTrans: 已命名物体被玩家攻击

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object has killed (comparison) number of object type or type list.
scriptDesc: Script will compare if a unit has killed (x) number of object type(s).
scriptTrans: 命名对象已终止（比较）对象类型或类型列表的数量

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object is attacked by a specific object type.
scriptTrans: 命名对象受到特定对象类型的攻击

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object is destroyed by a specific object type.
scriptTrans: 命名对象由特定的对象类型销毁

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object is destroyed.
scriptDesc: This will return true if the unit is dead or does not exist.  It will also return true if the unit doesn
scriptTrans: 命名对象被销毁

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object is dying. (Cinematic)
scriptDesc: Returns true if the unit is currently dead, if the unit doesn
scriptArg: ~ has been killed, but is still on screen.
scriptTrans: 命名对象正在死亡。(电影)

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object is finished dying. (Cinematic)
scriptDesc: This will return true if the unit no longer exists but did in the past.  If the unit currently exists it will return false.
scriptArg: ~ has been killed, and is finished dying.
scriptTrans: 命名对象结束死亡。(电影)

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object's health % compared to a value.
scriptDesc: Compares the unit's current health relative to the initial health (which may be modified in World Builder) to the value.
scriptTrans: 命名对象的运行状况%与某个值的比较

scriptName: Object Type/Attacked, Destroyed, or Exists/Named object's veterancy level compared to a value.
scriptTrans: 命名对象的经验等级与一个值的比较

scriptName: Object Type/Experience/Named object has gained experience level.
scriptTrans: 命名对象获得经验等级

scriptName: Object Type/Garrison/Evaluates if named object is currently holding passengers.
scriptArg: Evaluate if ~ is containing any passengers.
scriptTrans: 评估指定对象当前是否携带乘客

scriptName: Object Type/Garrison/Named building is garrisoned by object type owned by specific player.
scriptArg: ~ is garrisoned by object type ~ owned by ~.
scriptTrans: 命名建筑由特定玩家拥有的对象类型驻守

scriptName: Object Type/Garrisoned/A specific building is empty.

scriptName: Object Type/Stance/Named object is using stance.

scriptName: Platform/Is game running on platform.
